name: plane
description: Plane is a self-hosted project and issue tracking tool designed for small teams. It features Kanban, timelines, Git syncing, and powerful filters with a sleek UI.
features: Issue tracking: Create and manage issues with custom fields, priorities, and status workflows.
Kanban boards: Visualize work with drag-and-drop kanban boards for agile project management.
Timeline views: Plan projects with Gantt-style timeline views showing dependencies and milestones.
Git integration: Sync issues with GitHub, GitLab, or Bitbucket for automated status updates from commits.
Advanced filters: Find issues quickly with powerful filtering by assignee, labels, dates, and custom fields.
Team collaboration: Mention teammates, add comments, and track activity on issues in real-time.
Cycle planning: Organize work into sprints or cycles with velocity tracking and burndown charts.
Custom workflows: Define project-specific workflows and automation rules for issue state transitions.
Notifications: Receive alerts for issue updates, mentions, and project activity via email or in-app.
API access: Integrate with external tools using a comprehensive REST API for automation.
Multiple views: Switch between list, kanban, calendar, and spreadsheet views for different perspectives.
Project templates: Create reusable project templates with predefined workflows and issue types.
